Title: Caprica
Actors: Eric Stoltz, Esai Morales, Paula Malcomson, Alessandra Torresani
Plot: Two families, the Graystones and the Adamas, live together on a peaceful planet known as Caprica, where a startling breakthrough in artificial intelligence brings about unforeseen consequences. A spin-off of the Sci Fi Channel series "Battlestar Galactica" set 50 years prior to the events of that show.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
